Verses: 1 pinnum Karththar Yobukku Uththaravaaga:
2 sarvavallavarode Vazhakkaadi Avarukku Buththi Padippikkiravan Yaar? Dhevanperil Kutram Pidikkiravan Ivaigalukku Uththaravu Sollakkadavan Endraar.
3 appozhudhu Yobu Karththarukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga:
4 idho, Naan Neesan; Naan Umakku Enna Maruuththaravu Solluven; En Kaiyinaal En Vaayaip Poththikkollugiren.
5 naan Irandorudharam Pesinen; Ini Naan Pradhiyuththaram Kodaamalum Pesaamalum Iruppen Endraan.
6 appozhudhu Karththar Perungaatril Irundhu Yobukku Uththaravu Arulinaar.
7 ippodhum Purushanaippola Nee Araikattikkol; Naan Unnaikketpen, Nee Enakku Uththaravusollu.
8 nee En Nyaayaththai Avamaakkuvaayo? Nee Unnai Needhimaanaakkikkollumpadikku Enmel Kutranchumaththuvaayo?
9 dhevanudaiya Buyaththaippol Unakku Buyamundo? Avaraippol Idimuzhakkamaai Saththamidakkoodumo?
10 ippodhum Nee Mukkiyaththaalum Magaththuvaththaalum Unnai Alangariththu, Magimaiyaiyum Ganaththaiyum Thariththukkondu,
11 nee Un Kobaththin Ukkiraththai Veesi, Agandhaiyullavanaiyellaam Thedippaarththuth Thaazhththivittu,
12 perumaiyullavanaiyellaam Gavaniththu, Avanaip Paniyappanni, Dhunmaarkkarai Avargalirukkira Sthalaththile Midhiththuvidu.
13 nee Avargalai Egamaaip Puzhudhiyile Pudhaiththu, Avargal Mugangalai Andharangaththile Kattippodu.
14 appozhudhu Un Valadhukai Unakku Ratchippu Undupannum Endru Solli Naan Unnaip Pugazhuven.
15 ippodhum Pikemoththai Nee Gavaniththuppaar; Unnai Undaakkinadhupola Adhaiyum Undaakkinen; Adhu Maattaippol Pullaith Thinnum.
16 idho, Adhinudaiya Belan Adhin Iduppilum, Adhin Veeriyam Adhin Vayitrin Narambugalilum Irukkiradhu.
17 adhu Than Vaalaik Kedhuru Maraththaippol Neettugiradhu; Adhin Iduppu Narambugal Pinnikkondirukkiradhu.
18 adhin Elumbugal Kettiyaana Vengalaththaippolavum, Adhin Asthigal Iruppu Kambigalaippolavum Irukkiradhu.
19 adhu Dhevanudaiya Kiriyaigalil Pradhaanamaana Oru Kiriyai, Adhai Undaakkinavar Adharku Oru Pattayaththaiyum Koduththaar.
20 kaattumirugangal Yaavum Vilaiyaadugira Malaigal Adharku Meychchalai Vilaivikkum.
21 adhu Nizhalulla Sedigalin Keezhum, Naanalin Maraivilum, Ulaiyilum Paduththukkollum.
22 thazhaigalin Nizhal Adhaik Kavindhu, Nadhiyin Alarigal Adhai Soozhndhu Kollum.
23 idho, Nadhi Purandu Vandhaalum Adhu Bayandhodaadhu; Yordhaan Nadhiyaththanai Thanneer Adhin Mugaththil Modhinaalum Adhu Asaiyaamalirukkum.
24 adhin Kangal Paarththirukka Adhai Yaar Pidikkakkoodum? Mookkanaankayirupoda Adhin Mookkai Yaar Kuththakkoodum?
